'''Immaculate Pulse''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Beyond Mortality" [[Baizhu]] ({{Dendro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|Immaculate Pulse}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Jadefall's Splendor]], a weapon tailored to Baizhu's gameplay mechanics.
